name: Exotica: Petshop Simulator
description:
Exotica is a simulation game where you run an exotic pet shop in the city.

DO YOU LOVE EXOTIC ANIMALS TOO?



Design an amazing exotic pet shop. Bring exotic animal lovers together with these lovely creatures.

LAY OUT YOUR SHOP THE WAY YOUR WANT.



Design your shop the best you can. Do not ignore customers' requests. A satisfied customer means more customers.

START WITH LITTLE AND GROW INTO A BIG PETSHOP.



Don't forget to pay your bills and bank debts because it can bankrupt your shop.

BREED ANIMALS OF DIFFERENT SPECIES.



Get more profit by breeding your animals. Rare animals are more in demand.

ARE YOU A GAMBLER?



Whether you earn money legally or illegally is entirely up to you.

HIRE AN EMPLOYEE TO LIGHTEN YOUR WORKLOAD!



Hire employees for your shop. Staff is the only person to help you when the shop gets crowded. But beware, employees may have phobias and waste that will damage your shop.
